gw.api.admin

Class GroupUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.admin.GroupUtil

  • public class GroupUtil
extends Object
    Utility method for creating groups.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Object

        Class

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Group createGroup(Organization org, Group parent)
      Creates a new group set its parent group according to the given organization or parent group. The group is created in the bundle of the current PCF location and its parent is set as follows: Both org and parent are null: The new group will belong to the user's Organization, or null if there is none, and its parent will be the organization's root group (or null if the user's organization is null) org is null, parent is non-null: The new group will belong to the parent's Organization, and will have the specified parent org is non-null, parent is null: The new group will belong to the specified Organization, and its parent will be the Organization's root group org is non-null, parent is non-null: This is currently only legal if the specified parent group belongs to the specified organization, because it a group may only have a parent in a different Organization if it is a root group and the specified Organization is the parent of its Organization
      static GroupRegion[] createGroupRegions(Region[] picked, com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Location webLocation)
      Create a new GroupRegion entity for each Region in the "picked" array and set the Region property of that new GroupRegion to the corresponding Region. The new GroupRegion entities are created in the given location's bundle.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createGroup

        Group createGroup(Organization org,
                Group parent)
        Creates a new group set its parent group according to the given organization or parent group. The group is created in the bundle of the current PCF location and its parent is set as follows:
        • Both org and parent are null: The new group will belong to the user's Organization, or null if there is none, and its parent will be the organization's root group (or null if the user's organization is null)
        • org is null, parent is non-null: The new group will belong to the parent's Organization, and will have the specified parent
        • org is non-null, parent is null: The new group will belong to the specified Organization, and its parent will be the Organization's root group
        • org is non-null, parent is non-null: This is currently only legal if the specified parent group belongs to the specified organization, because it a group may only have a parent in a different Organization if it is a root group and the specified Organization is the parent of its Organization
        Parameters:
        org - the organization whose root group should be used as the new group's parent, or null.
        parent - the parent group for the new group, or null
        Returns:
        a new group in the location's bundle

      • createGroupRegions

        GroupRegion[] createGroupRegions(Region[] picked,
                               com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Location webLocation)
        Create a new GroupRegion entity for each Region in the "picked" array and set the Region property of that new GroupRegion to the corresponding Region. The new GroupRegion entities are created in the given location's bundle.
        Parameters:
        picked - the picked values
        webLocation - the location
        Returns:
        an array of GroupRegion entities, one for each picked Region
